KAli:

"We have two intruders inside and one outside"replied Kali"But they 
are annoyest than a  whole maximal-troop"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        "Okay.  So we've got two separate groups of intruders inside 
and at 
> least one group outside?  I wouldn't worry about the ones outside 
unless 
> they're a serious threat to the base.  Of the two inside, I suggest 
pinning 
> the one with the virus at a corner with bots in both halls.  The 
other 
> group... hmm... the same tactic would work unless they're fast.  In 
which 
> case the best place would be a long hallway.  They could get up to 
high 
> speeds but there's no maneuverability at those speeds.  All it 
would take is 
> a slight kick or shot and they'd lose their balance and get 
seriously 
> injured.  So how many bots do we have to take on these intruders?"
